item.title: AR-List
item.description:

  • AR.js: Efficient Augmented Reality for the Web using ARToolKit - 60fps on mobile!

  • 2017-Quora-500 Data Structures and Algorithms practice problems and their solutions

  • 2017-ngraph.path : Fast path finding for arbitrary graphs.

  • DevDocs : API Documentation Browser.

  • Etherpad : Etherpad is a highly customizable Open Source online editor providing collaborative editing in really real-time.

  • HackMD : HackMD lets you create realtime collaborative markdown notes on all platforms.Inspired by Hackpad, with more focus on speed and flexibility.Still in the early stage, feel free to fork or contribute to HackMD.

  • Understanding Git #Series#: Git is a powerful tool, but it has a reputation of baffling newcomers. It doesnâ€™t help that most people are simply thrown in at the deep end and expected to swim.

  • Git Magicã€‹ðŸ“š: Rather than go into details, we provide rough instructions for particular effects. After repeated use, gradually you will understand how each trick works, and how to tailor the recipes for your needs.

  • 2017-How open source licenses work and how to add them to your projects

  • 2016-Imperative vs Declarative Programming: At this point youâ€™ve undoubtedly heard about imperative programming vs declarative programming. You might have even searched for what those terms actually mean.

  • 2017-The Software Architecture Chronicles: In them, I write about what Iâ€™ve learned on Software Architecture, how I think of it, and how I use that knowledge.

  • 2017-Software Engineering is different from Programming: All software engineers can program, but not all programmers can engineer software.

  • 2022-MONOCLE #Project#: a pocket sized AR device for the imaginative hacker
